full_threads.body:
Hi Criselda,

Thanks for the heads-up—looking forward to your follow-up email once the product category hierarchy changes are finalized.

Just a quick update on your notes:
  • Menu is now visible
  • Applied the same formatting in the checklist field for colors
  • Fixed the buttons and descriptions of the colorways

For the design/patterns, it might be a cache issue on your end, but I’ll also double-check with our dev team on Monday to be sure.

Thank you again, and wishing you a great weekend!

Hi Adriane No worries. Please see initial comments below. Also, just want to give a heads up that there will be some changes to the product category hierarchy. I'll send a separate email once it is finalized.
  • Can still see the design/patterns
  • Menu is not visible
  • Color filters - please follow the same font styling and spacing with what we have for product search. I'll also send a separate email on the filters for WoodBeQuiet as I realized we only have here the filters for FilaSorb
  • Fix how the buttons and descriptions of the colorways are displayed
Thanks! Warm regards, Criselda Romero Digital Marketing Manager T: +61 1800 626 462 2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153 acoufelt.com

(Time: 10mins) - Change layout

Closing - waiting for customer reply

Hi Criselda,

Apologies for the delay in getting back to you on this. I’ve adjusted the layout based on your requests—here’s what’s been updated:
  • Checkmark fields are closer together
  • Product title font weight is now set to 400
  • Design/pattern display below each product has been removed

Since the page is private, you can view it through WordPress admin using this link: Collections Page

Please take a look when you get a chance and let me know if any further tweaks are needed.

Hi Criselda,

Thanks for letting us know and for sending over the new layout instructions.

We’ve set the page to private so it won’t appear in search results while updates are still in progress.

Once the changes are completed, we’ll follow up with you before making it live again.

If there's anything else you'd like us to adjust, don't hesitate to reach us out. Always happy to help!

Hi Adriane

Could we also make this page private first while we're still updating it? The page comes up in search results when I tried to search for Acoufelt collections.

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153
acoufelt.com

Hi Adriane No worries! I couldn't access color search. It says page not found. For product search, here are few comments which focus on styling. I still have to review the search function and get back to you on that.
  • Hide the designs/patterns under the product name as indicated in the mockup I sent
  • For the product name, can we change the font weight to regular (400)?
  • Lessen the spacing on top of Colorways and Thickness
Thanks! Warm regards, Criselda Romero Digital Marketing Manager T: +61 1800 626 462 2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153 acoufelt.com

Hey Criselda,

I apologize. I seem to have failed to attached the screenshots. Here they are.

Hey Criselda,

Adriane here—stepping in for Joel.

We’ve made the updates you requested based on the files you attached. You can review the changes here: Acoufelt Collections. I’ve also attached some screenshots so you can see how the page looks now.

If you’d like any alterations or further tweaks, just let us know—we’re always happy to help!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Adriane Roa
Joel Maligalig assigned to Allie Borcena

Hi Criselda,

Thanks for your feedback.

Confirming we have updated the page. Can you please try now?
https://acoufelt.com.au/collections/
https://acoufelt.com.au/collections/?browse=colors

Hi Joel This is great! Just have a few comments on the styling.
  • Remove the lines
  • Switch the sample tabs on top with the heading below
  • Remove 'Filter by'
  • For the default text in the search bar make it - Search a product and Search a color (tried searching for a color but it's not working on my end)
  • Make the heading bold for Ceiling Solutions, Wall Solutions, FilaSorb, WoodBeQuiet
  • Could we scale down the page by 10%, similar to how my mockup looks
Please see the attached mockups for reference which I have also shared before but I added a few texts to the upper right of the page. For the product sample, let's not put any hyperlink first to 'request sample'. Looking at linking this to a separate form. Thank you! Warm regards, Criselda Romero Digital Marketing Manager T: +61 1800 626 462 2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153 acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

I hope you are doing well.

We have been working on the collections pages.

For Browse Products - All done
  • For Collection Filters - We've combined Collections Filter as they are connected to each other


For Browse Colors - All done
  • Colors has been applied for Filasorb only.

Thanks Allie

I'll just wait for the update.

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager

2 Jackstaff Court, Bayswater, VIC, 3153

Hi Criselda,

Just a quick confirmation that our developer is now reviewing the new design approach and will reach out to you soon.

Let us know if there's anything else we can do, always happy to help
